Prerequisite: You need a custom Filament theme to include the FlowForge styles.
If you haven't set up a custom theme for Filament, follow the
Once you have a custom Filament theme set up, add the plugin's views to your theme CSS file:
language-css shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme material-theme-palenight
Create a migration to add the position column:
language-php shiki shiki-themes material-theme-lighter material-theme material-theme-palenight
Visit your Filament panel to see your Kanban board in action.
Fix corrupted or missing position data
